name: Ensure RDS instances use encrypted volumes
body: Encrypt Amazon RDS instances and snapshots at rest, by enabling the encryption option for your Amazon RDS DB instance.
remediationDescription: Follow the [AWS documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/UserGuide/Overview.Encryption.html#Overview.Encryption.Enabling) describing Amazon RDS encryption and how to enable it. For already existing instances, the only way is through a snapshot.
